definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Three years ago I started to work on my new novel, Death Fugue.
sentences.chinese: 三年過去了，開始寫新小說《死亡賦格曲》。

sentences.english: She will phrase a fugue of Bach's in these days.
sentences.chinese: 這幾天她將把巴赫的賦格曲分成旋律分句。

sentences.english: Bach. One Prelude and Fugue from Well-tempered Clavier.
sentences.chinese: 巴赫，《十二平均律鋼琴曲集》一個前奏和賦格曲。

sentences.english: She will phrase fugue of Bach's in these days.
sentences.chinese: 這幾天她將把巴赫的賦格曲分成旋律分句。

sentences.english: In the fugue’s development the subject is augmented.
sentences.chinese: 在賦格曲的主題展開中主旋律的音被延長了。

sentences.english: She will phrase a fugue of Bach's in these days.
sentences.chinese: 巴赫，《十二平均律鋼琴曲集》一個前奏和賦格曲。

sentences.english: I'm going to play you a Bach fugue .
sentences.chinese: 我要給你演奏巴赫的一首賦格曲。

sentences.english: Can you transpose this fugue into G major?
sentences.chinese: 你能把這個賦格曲轉換成G大調嗎。
